item.description:
Tickets are on sale now for this show.  Showtime is at 7.  I will be at the theater by 6 and we will head in for seats by 6:25.  

If you miss the group on the way in, find us after.  We gather in the hallway outside the room where the movie is being shown to discuss the film a bit, allow for restroom breaks and get a head count of all those who are interested in going out after for dinner and drinks and more movie talk.   

If you are planning to go to the after event, please bring cash!  Also remember to tip well....the servers deserve it for dealing with a big group of crazy movie fans!

 

Movie Details:

Release Date: November 18, 2011
Studio: Summit Entertainment
Director: Bill Condon
Screenwriter: Melissa Rosenberg
Starring: Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson, Taylor Lautner, Peter Facinelli, Ashley Greene, Kellan Lutz, Jackson Rathbone, Elizabeth Reaser, Nikki Reed, Billy Burke, Rami Malek, Maggie Grace, Mackenzie Foy, Tracey Heggins, Judi Shekoni, Omar Metwally, Andrea Gabriel, Rami Malek, Angela Sarafyan, Marlane Barnes, Lisa Howard, Patrick Brennan, Noel Fisher, Guri Weinberg, Lee Pace, Toni Trucks, Bill Tangradi, Erik Odom, Valorie Curry, Joe Anderson, Olga Fonda, Janelle Froehlich, Masami Kosaka, Sebastiao Lemos, Amadou Ly, Ty Olsson, Wendell Pierce, Carolina Virguez
Genre: Drama, Romance, Thriller 

Plot Summary: " The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn " will be released as two separate films with the first of the two slated to be released in theatres on November 18, 2011.

The project, based on the fourth novel in author Stephenie Meyer's "Twilight" series, is currently being written by Melissa Rosenberg with Wyck Godfrey, Karen Rosenfelt and Stephenie Meyer producing. "The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn " will start production in the fall.

"The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn" illuminates the secrets and mysteries of this spelbinding romantic epic that has entranced millions.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a meetup pin. If the movie is showing upstairs, I will snag a table by the windows at the top of the escalator. If it is showing downstairs I will be near the rope by the concession stand.
item.name: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 1(7PM Show)
